task_background: Secure and decontaminate the abandoned industrial research complex to prevent hazardous material leaks and reactivate essential systems.

tasks.task_description: Place the industrial_flashlight_1 on the pegboard_1.
Find the heaviest, metal object on the main_factory_floor and place it on the workbench_1.
Use the spill_containment_kit_1 to dry the wet area in the main_factory_floor.
Use the sharpener_1 to sharpen the shattered_obsidian_dagger_1.
